pr_title: avoid crash when trying to log a PM cache as basic member

timeline.bodyText:
This will not work when "<" is part of the cache name. I tested with creating such cache name - this was possible. What about

(.+)<\/h1> ? (plus extra \ of cause) Interesting question: is or was a cache name eg. head

or

not? possible? At least today the html tags were filtered out on my tests creating such cache name.
timeline.author: bekuno
